articles.title: 44 more new COVID-19 cases reported in Waterloo Region - Global News

articles.title: Scientists Discover "Hidden" Gene In COVID-19, May Add To Unique Biology: Report - NDTV
articles.description: Researchers have discovered a new "hidden" gene in the novel coronavirus which may contribute to its unique biology and pandemic potential, an advance that may lead to the development of new therapeutics against the deadly virus.

articles.title: Washington reports over 1,440 new coronavirus cases in the past 24 hours | News - Daily Hive
articles.content: The Washington government has revealed that the states COVID-19-related death toll is 2,482 after announcing 22 new deaths since Monday afternoon.
